name: ABC Letters Mania - The Amazing Alphabet
name_original: ABC Letters Mania - The Amazing Alphabet
description:
• ABC Letters Mania•

ABC Letters Mania will test your grammar skills and ability to problem solve, despite its simple design.
Your ultimate impossible goal is to continually spell check and think about how to add pairs in order to clear more space on the board. Sounds simple? It's not!

• FEATURES •

- Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles.
- When two tiles with the same letter touch, they merge into one.
- Work row-by-row or side-by-side, keeping yourself organized.
- Try and solve the uppercase jumble.
- It's all about delicate planning and execution.
- Elementary school basic alphabet knowledge needed.
- Getting to the final letter will make you full of glee :)
- Easy to learn, hard to master addictive gameplay.

Join the letters and get to the final tile!

- Simple controls
- Undo support
- Addicting gameplay
- High score
- Clear and simple UI
What are you waiting for? GET IT NOW!
